Module fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant
Package fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.dao.abuse

Class AbuseDAO

java.lang.Object
fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.dao.abuse.AbuseDAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbuseDAOSQLite
public abstract class AbuseDAO extends Object
Abstract Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling interactions with the database related to abuse entries.

  • Method Details

    • createAbuse

      public Abuse createAbuse (String message, User dest)
      Creates a new abuse entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      message - The message associated with the abuse.
      dest - The destination user for the abuse.
      Returns:
      The created Abuse object.

    • updateAbuse

      public Abuse updateAbuse (Abuse abuse, StatusEnum status)
      Updates the status of an existing abuse entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      abuse - The abuse entry to update.
      status - The new status for the abuse entry.
      Returns:
      The updated Abuse object.

    • deleteAbuse

      public Abuse deleteAbuse (Abuse abuse)
      Deletes an existing abuse entry from the database.
      Parameters:
      abuse - The abuse entry to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted Abuse object.

    • getAllAbuses

      public ArrayList<Abuse> getAllAbuses()
      Retrieves all abuse entries from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Abuse objects representing all abuse entries.
